channel.title: How would I make my client "downloadable"?
channel.description:
Im new to clients, and I just made a cool PVP server, and I asked myself "How would I make the client downloadable without give them them all the class 8 and compile.bat and all that?"
Someone help!

item.title: How would I make my client "downloadable"?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“john5689, post:2, topic:277621”]That would be a very bad idear because:

A: no one will download
B: It’s stupid just leave it and if they want to edit let them edit
C: Donno about C
D: Same as C[/quote]
yo dude… i run a secessful server and have 200+ downloads of my client… and all i did was delete ALL .java files… and the compile .bat… (AFTER MAKING A COPY!!!)

Read full topic
item.source: How would I make my client "downloadable"?
